timeline.message: refactor: Pass DetectInfo in bean method rather than autowire.
refactor: Add argument to codeLocationNameService method.
refactor: Fix code issue by using generics on the class rather than methods.
test: Change the main method to a test and Ignore it by default.

timeline.bodyText: If we ignore the test, should we just remove it?
timeline.author: taikuukaits

replies.bodyText: I only kept it as an ignored test so that a user could always run the test manually in the IDE if needed.  When Polaris support is removed from detect then this class can be removed.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: test: Skip test if polaris environment variables missing.
